titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on fresh cantaloupes imported between January 1 and May 15 of each year.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on fresh cantaloupes entered into the United States during the period from January 1 to May 15, inclusive, in any year.
